stories.title: Select a Value from 'Select Value' Dropdown
stories.description: As a user, I want to select an option from the 'Select Value' dropdown so that I can choose the appropriate group option.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I view the 'Select Value' field, Then the text 'Group 1, option 2' should be displayed.

stories.title: Select a Title from 'Select One' Dropdown
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a title from the 'Select One' dropdown so that I can choose the appropriate title.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I view the 'Select One' field, Then the text 'Mr.' should be displayed.

stories.title: Select a Color from Old Style Select Menu
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a color from the 'Old Style Select Menu' so that I can specify my color preference.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I view the 'Old Style Select Menu', Then the text 'Red' should be displayed.

stories.title: Choose Multiple Colors from Multiselect Dropdown
stories.description: As a user, I want to select multiple colors from the multiselect dropdown so that I can choose several options.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the multiselect dropdown is populated, When I view the field, Then the selected options 'Black' and 'Blue' should be displayed with remove options.

stories.title: Select Cars from Standard Multi Select
stories.description: As a user, I want to select multiple cars from the standard multi-select so that I can choose several car options.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the multi-select box is visible, When I select options, Then 'Volvo', 'Saab', 'Opel', and 'Audi' should be highlighted and selectable.
